The movie tells the story of two young women who become obsessed with the idea that they might have been killed by one of their professors.

In conclusion, both "The Shadows" directed by Alex Roman in 2015 and "The Whistler" directed by Paul Thomas Anderson in 2016 are well-made horror movies that fit within the genre.
